definition: incision/notch/slit/gash/margin of a page/trimmed edge (of a page in a book)
slang/argot/private language used as secret code
definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: Make a cut in the shape of a cross in the bag with a cutter flamed .
sentences.chinese: 用火焰切割器在包裝上切開一個十字形切口。

sentences.english: A simple compass is helpful for scribing the flowerpot cutouts.
sentences.chinese: 一個簡單的指南針，是有助於劃線的花盆切口。

sentences.english: Endarterectomy removes fatty plaque through an incision in the neck.
sentences.chinese: 通過在頸部切口去除內膜上的脂肪斑塊。

sentences.english: Wear resistance of cake cutting knives using a special abrasion-proof material.
sentences.chinese: 蛋糕切口刀子耐磨性使用特別磨蝕證明材料。

sentences.english: The muscle and fascial layers are incised lateral to a rectus incision .
sentences.chinese: 在腹直肌切口外側切開肌肉和筋膜層。

sentences.english: Objective To study the influence of High-frequency electric surgical knives on abdominal incision healing.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討高頻電刀對腹部切口癒合的影響。

sentences.english: CONCLUSIONS General surgery incision infection rate is higher deu to a variety of factors.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討引起普通外科手術切口感染相關因素及預防。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the skin incision of the median sternotomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索胸骨正中劈開徑路理想的皮膚切口。

sentences.english: To study effect of 3 kinds of Incisions on early astigmatism after cataract surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究3種白內障手術切口對術後早期散光的影響。

sentences.english: Objective To study the value of ultrasound in incisional hernia before and after its operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討超聲對切口疝修補手術前後檢查的應用價值。

sentences.english: To observe the clinic effects of preventive application of antibiotic in incision of perineum in postpartum.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察產後會陰切口預防性應用抗生素的臨牀效果。

sentences.english: The traditional approach is done through an incision in the abdominal wall.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的手術方式是在腹壁上開切口。

sentences.english: No wound infection or pulmonary embolism were found. 2 cases got involved with urinary tract infection.
sentences.chinese: 無切口感染及肺栓塞發生，2例出現尿道感染。

sentences.english: There was no significant difference in incision scar and lower eyelid ectropion .
sentences.chinese: 兩組在切口瘢痕方面無明顯差別，均無下瞼外翻。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo sum up the experiences of arc incision treating gluteus contracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結弧形小切口治療臀肌攣縮症的治療體會。

sentences.english: The length of incision was about 60% of routine median sternotomy.
sentences.chinese: 切口長度約爲常規胸骨正中切口的60%。

definition: to sew together/suture (in surgery)/to sew up (a wound)
hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage
